local_intent: Grasp the dishwasher handle by aligning, closing the gripper with force 30, and verifying a stable grasp.
assumptions: Robot is already within reach of the handle and roughly in approach pose.
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase using the same target and bins as the global plan (open to 0.09, close with force 30/800, tolerance 0.01) and ends with IsGraspStable.
